topics.body:
Oh god no; not only did I lose my nekomimi folder, but I lost a large chunk of my traps folder.

I'm so angry I feel like freezing a shit in the shape of a knife and making the person who came up with such a stupid system of file handling eat it.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e2fa0863687219e8140000#post_53e2fa0863687219e8140000
Long fucking explanation; short version is I was doing something that was routine and shouldn't have deleted my files.

To use a analogy it'd be like changing out your oil in your car only for your oil level to be connected to how intact your wheels are to your car and refilling your oil causes your tires to come off.

I haven't the foggiest clue how this would make sense.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e2fa5c63687265c5670100#post_53e2fa5c63687265c5670100
[bq="Whatevs"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e2f8f463687260339b0000#post_53e2f8f463687260339b0000
Steam OS when?[/bq]
Some time early spring.

I can't use steamOS on this computer cause AMD support for the 4500 isn't out yet.  I really can't wait for that, cause the amount of stupid shit people do making linux is ridunkulous and I can't wait for valve to fix the problems.  Linux is good, but half the time I want to slap the shit out of whoever thought <x> was a good idea.
